descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]CN [/b][b]- Resource Pack[/b][/size] - [size=5][b][size=3][url=http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57668-1-1411132911.png][b]What is included in the pack?[/b][/url][/size]
[size=5][b]
YOU WILL NOT HAVE TO PAY TO USE MY MODS. THEY WILL ALWAYS BE FREE. [/b][/size]

[/b][/size]And more to come it is ongoing so if you have anything you would like to see in this pack, please suggest it in the comments area and I will see what I can do to add it in. These resources consist mostly of my own textures, and a couple of my edits of vanilla textures. Not everyone may need these specific assets but for those who do, I do hope you enjoy. If you are having problems with them please inform me of it in the comments area.
[size=4][b]
[/b][/size][size=4][b]How to use?[/b][/size]
If you are not familiar with loading assets in [url=http://i.imgur.com/AIZjiJI.png]I have made a tutorial that you can follow to add them in[/url].

[b][size=3]My Assets Policy[/size][/b]
You can use the assets for your own mods as long as you credit me as the source author, and you do not sell or redistribute.

[size=4][b]Credits[/b][/size]
Textures for the tree bark, walls, pillar, dirt mounds, the throne pillow, the back of the throne and basket are by me.
Niftools for Nifskope
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
[size=3][size=2][b][size=3]
My Other Work[/size][/b]
[/size][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58412/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58412-1-1419581431.jpg[/img][/url]
author: BrownPastel
